summary: You can have the Winter Soldier, AKA Bucky Barnes as your faithful companion! He's inside the inn in Riverwood so you can pick him up at the very beginning of the game. If anyone knows how to post this to xbox one or is willing to do it for me PLEASE let me know!
descriptionHtml: I love the Winter Soldier and I wanted him as a companion but couldn't find him anywhere, so I made my own. I hope you like him! You can have the Winter Soldier, AKA Bucky Barnes as your faithful companion! He's inside the inn in Riverwood so you can pick him up at the very beginning of the game. If anyone knows how to post this to xbox one or is willing to do it for me PLEASE let me know!
author: Blackthorrn
